輵是一个汉语词语，读音是gé，同“轕”。
輵 is a Chinese word, the pronunciation is gé, which is the same as "轕".

輵字的基本解释

輵
gé
古同“轕”。

輵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yà］
［《集韻》乙轄切，入黠，影。］
(1)车声。
(2)山不相连貌。参见“輵”。
[②]［è］
［《集韻》阿葛切，入曷，影。］
见“輵2轄”。
[③]［gé］
［《廣韻》古達切，入曷，見。］
亦作“轕1”。
见“輵3轇”。

輵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輵； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1246第20
【廣韻】古達切【集韻】居曷切，?音葛。【廣韻】轇輵，戟形。【集韻】鋒戟形。　又【廣韻】馳驅貌。【集韻】車馬喧雜貌。　又【集韻】乙轄切【正韻】乙黠切，?音揠。車聲。【揚雄·羽獵賦】皇車幽輵。　又【集韻】丘葛切，音渴。義同。　又【集韻】阿葛切，音遏。輵轄，轉搖貌。【史記·司馬相如傳】跮踱輵轄。【註】輵轄，搖目吐舌也。或作轕。通作葛。詳後轕字註。

輵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
輵字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yà］
["Ji Yun" Yi Jue cut, enter the key, shadow. ]
(1) The sound of cars.
(2) The mountains are not connected with each other. See "輵".
[②] [è]
["Jiyun" A Geqie, Entering, Shadow. ]
See "輵2 Jurisdiction".
[③]［gé］
["Guang Yun" Gu Daqie, enter the 曷, see. ]
Also known as "轕1".
See "輵3轇".

[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輵; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1246 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Gu Daqie [Ji Yun] Habitat cut,? Yin Ge. [Guangyun] 轇輵, halberd-shaped. 【Jiyun】The shape of a halberd.　[Guangyun] drove the appearance. [Ji Yun] Chariots and horses are noisy and complex.　 [Ji Yun] Yi Jue Cut [Zheng Yun] Yi Yu Cut,? Sound. The sound of cars. 【Yang Xiong·Yu Lie Fu】The imperial car is secluded.　[Jiyun] Qiu Ge cut, sound thirsty. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Ageqie, sound restrained. Administer, change your appearance. [Historical Records·Sima Xiangru Biography] [Note] He administers, shakes his eyes and sticks out his tongue. Or make 轕. Pass for Ge. Detailed note after the word.
